    level="1"

>
[Stone Blood](/Feats.aspx?ID=890) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Living Monolith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=16)

**Prerequisites**
[Ka Stone Ritual](/Feats.aspx?ID=889)

</column>

---

You can selectively stop your bleeding with ease. Reduce the DC of flat checks to stop persistent bleed damage you have from 15 to 10, and you can use a single action that has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait to gain an early flat check without physically binding the wounds. You recover naturally from the [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) condition twice as quickly as normal.
name: Stone Blood
